metadata.metaDescription: Our cover story features Samuel Miele, an 18-year-old entrepreneur, podcaster and owner of Vision Luxx, a multi-media company that is changing the face of digital marketing in Niagara. Discover how Sam launched his business during the COVID-19 pandemic, transitioning from a solo business owner to running a company of six in just under a year! Other feature articles include Gregor Sayliss, owner of coffee shop Wandering Spirits. Learn how w he transitioned from a career job to establishing his own business in the community of downtown St Catharines. In this issue, you’ll also read about relationship expert Chris Simone, owner of Bridgewater Yoga in Chippawa ON, and how his podcast BRAINSCRUB is helping employers reengage with their employees after the COVID-19 pandemic. Get some advice from real estate investor Daniel P Chin on multi-dwelling property investments. Check in with journalist Karen Abbott-Trimuel as she gives some tips to business owners on how regulate their own self tune-ups!
